content.question: Ai Weiwei chose to use porcelain to create sunflower seeds because the material

choices.label: references the mechanization of Chinese agriculture during the 1950s
connects the work to China’s long tradition of porcelain production
associates the work with England’s colonial porcelain trade
alludes to the fragility of everyday life in modern societies

content.answer: connects the work to China’s long tradition of porcelain production
